common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"user_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a user."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by(depends on different APIs) partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token,  user_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm."}]
define: Get specific performance data for products linked with Shopee Video. There is at least a one-day delay.
params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The start index of request. Starting from 1.

","name":"page_no","sample":"1","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"PykzWac"},{"description":"

The number of item returned by this request. Max is 20.

","name":"page_size","sample":"10","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"FYGfraG"},{"description":"

Period Type. Applicable values:

Day
Week
Month

Last7d

Last15d

Last30d


Note: The end date must align with the Period Type.

","name":"period_type","sample":"Last7d","type":"string","required":"True","key":"JZKcfFH"},{"description":"

The end_date format should be \"YYYY-MM-DD\".

- For Day, Last7d, Last15d, and Last30d, the end_date must before current day.

- For Week, the end_date must be Sunday and must be less than or equal to the current week.

- For Month, the end_date must be the end of the month and must be less than or equal to the current month.

","name":"end_date","sample":"2025-10-30","type":"string","required":"True","key":"asfdsYp"},{"description":"

Use this field to specify which field to use to sort the returned list. Available values:

PlacedOrders

PlacedSales

PlacedUniqueBuyers

ConfirmedOrders

ConfirmedSales

ConfirmedUniqueBuyers

","name":"order_by","sample":"PlacedOrders","type":"string","required":"True","key":"wbjeiyJ"},{"description":"

Use this field to specify whether the returned list is sorted in ascending or descending order_by. Available values:

asc

desc

","name":"sort","sample":"desc","type":"string","required":"True","key":"xwCXFrc"},{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

","name":"item_id","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"YGyWZGp"},{"description":"

Search by product name.

","name":"item_name","sample":"test item name","type":"string","required":"False","key":"RNYjFnX"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"xKhEbzB"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"REZyewY"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"2af852cd-7420-4714-b7cd-33317f6fe548","type":"string","required":null,"key":"SXnbEZ"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"mkjDDjk","children":[{"description":"

The total count of product that match the condition.

","name":"total_count","sample":"","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"zPDQxs"},{"description":"

This is to indicate whether the video list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve the rest of data.

","name":"has_more","sample":"","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"AnaTzMC"},{"description":"

The list of product that match the condition.

","name":"list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"WEyWpfZ","children":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for a shop.

","name":"shop_id","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"jwPWpHK"},{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

","name":"item_id","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"xjnnkPX"},{"description":"

Name of the item.

","name":"item_name","sample":"test item name","type":"string","required":null,"key":"EESQpBk"},{"description":"

Cover image url of the item.

","name":"item_cover_image_url","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"mdzKSXB"},{"description":"

Description of the item.

","name":"item_description","sample":"desc","type":"string","required":null,"key":"nTfNPFT"},{"description":"

The number of placed orders for the item.

","name":"placed_orders","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"RMFiKBJ"},{"description":"

The number of confirmed orders for the item.

","name":"confirmed_orders","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"CMWzKZk"},{"description":"

The placed value of orders for the item.

","name":"placed_sales","sample":"1.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"DYFzHkd"},{"description":"

The confirmed value of orders for the item.

","name":"confirmed_sales","sample":"1.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"YiBixzG"},{"description":"

Number of unique buyers who placed order for the item.

","name":"placed_unique_buyers","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"tNhEdeP"},{"description":"

Number of unique buyers who confirmed order for the item.

","name":"confirmed_unique_buyers","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"YdPGnYi"},{"description":"

Data Date Range.

","name":"fetched_date_range","sample":"2025-10-30","type":"string","required":null,"key":"fFhCzQa"}]}]}]}
